alert.note: Alert for Sussex (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 12 at 3:33PM EDT until March 14 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex. In Pennsylvania, Carbon and Monroe. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow develops tonight, but then snow mixes with and changes to rain outside of the highest elevations on Monday before changing back to snow Monday night. Locally higher amounts expected in highest elevations.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
